published_at.description: The date and time when the product was published.

created_at.description: The date and time when the product was created.

published_scope.description: The scope of where the product is available for purchase.

vendor.description: The vendor or manufacturer of the product.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the product was last updated.

body_html.description: The HTML description of the product.

product_type.description: The type or category of the product.

options.description: Represents different customizable options available for the product.

name.description: The name of the product option.

product_id.description: The unique identifier of the product.

values.description: Possible values that can be selected for each option.

items.description: List of values associated with the product option.

id.description: The unique identifier of the product option.

position.description: The position of the product option.

image.description: Represents the main product image linked to one or more variants.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the image was last updated.

created_at.description: The date and time when the image was created.

variant_ids.description: Array of variant IDs associated with this image.

items.description: List of variant IDs associated with the image.

alt.description: The alternative text for the image.

src.description: The URL of the image source.

id.description: The unique identifier of the image.

admin_graphql_api_id.description: The unique identifier of the image in the Admin GraphQL API.

product_id.description: The unique identifier of the product associated with the image.

handle.description: The human-readable URL for the product.

images.description: Represents a collection of additional images related to the product.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the image was last updated.

created_at.description: The date and time when the image was created.

variant_ids.description: Array of variant IDs associated with each image.

items.description: List of variant IDs associated with the image.

alt.description: The alternative text for the image.

src.description: The URL of the image source.

id.description: The unique identifier of the image.

admin_graphql_api_id.description: The unique identifier of the image in the Admin GraphQL API.

product_id.description: The unique identifier of the product associated with the image.

template_suffix.description: The template suffix used for the product.

variants.description: Represents different versions or variations of the product.

tax_code.description: The tax code for the variant.

created_at.description: The date and time when the variant was created.

weight_unit.description: The unit of weight for the variant.

id.description: The unique identifier of the variant.

image_id.description: The unique identifier of the image associated with the variant.

inventory_policy.description: The inventory policy for the variant.

sku.description: The stock keeping unit (SKU) of the variant.

inventory_item_id.description: The unique identifier of the inventory item associated with the variant.

fulfillment_service.description: The fulfillment service for the variant.

inventory_management.description: The management method for the variant inventory.

taxable.description: Indicates if the variant is taxable.

admin_graphql_api_id.description: The unique identifier of the variant in the Admin GraphQL API.

option1.description: The value of option 1 for the variant.

compare_at_price.description: The original price of the product before any discounts.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the variant was last updated.

option2.description: The value of option 2 for the variant.

old_inventory_quantity.description: The previous quantity of the variant before change.

presentment_prices.description: Prices displayed to customers in different currencies or formats.

price.description: The price of the product variant.

currency_code.description: The currency code of the price.

compare_at_price.description: The compare at price in different currencies.

requires_shipping.description: Indicates if the variant requires shipping.

inventory_quantity.description: The available quantity of the variant.

grams.description: The weight of the variant in grams.

option3.description: The value of option 3 for the variant.

product_id.description: The unique identifier of the product associated with the variant.

admin_graphql_api_id.description: The unique identifier of the product in the Admin GraphQL API.

id.description: The unique identifier of the product.

shop_url.description: The URL of the shop where the product is listed.

deleted_at.description: The date and time when the product was deleted.

deleted_message.description: Message related to the deletion of the product.

deleted_description.description: Description of the reason for deletion.

description_html.description: The product's description in HTML format.

is_gift_card.description: Indicates whether the product is a gift card.

legacy_resource_id.description: The legacy resource ID of the product.

media_count.description: The total count of media (images/videos) associated with the product.

online_store_preview_url.description: The URL for previewing the product on the online store.

online_store_url.description: The URL of the product on the online store.

total_inventory.description: The total inventory count of the product.

total_variants.description: The total number of variants available for the product.

tracks_inventory.description: Indicates whether inventory tracking is enabled for the product.

has_only_default_variant.description: Whether the product has only a single variant with the default option and value.

has_out_of_stock_variants.description: Whether the product has out of stock variants.

requires_sellin_plan.description: Whether the product can only be purchased with a selling plan (subscription)

price_range_v2.description: The price range of the product with prices formatted as decimals.

featured_image.description: The featured image for the product.

alt_text.description: A word or phrase to share the nature or contents of an image.

height.description: The original height of the image in pixels. Returns null if the image isn't hosted by Shopify.

id.description: A unique ID for the image.

url.description: The location of the image as a URL.

width.description: The original width of the image in pixels. Returns null if the image isn't hosted by Shopify.

featured_media.description: The featured media for the product.

alt.description: A word or phrase to share the nature or contents of a media.

preview.description: The preview image for the media.

status.description: Current status of the preview image.

image.description: The preview image for the media. Returns 'null' until status is 'READY'

id.description: A unique ID for the image.

alt_text.description: A word or phrase to share the nature or contents of an image.

media_errors.description: Any errors which have occurred on the media.

code.description: Code representing the type of error.

media_warnings.description: The warnings attached to the media.

code.description: The code representing the type of warning.

feedback.description: Information about the product that's provided through resource feedback.

details.description: List of AppFeedback detailing issues regarding a resource.

app.description: The application associated to the feedback.

link.description: A link to where merchants can resolve errors.

url.description: The URL that the link visits.

messages.description: The feedback message presented to the merchant.

field.description: The path to the input field that caused the error.

summary.description: Summary of resource feedback pertaining to the resource.
